publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4847 Pauline McNeill: Criminal Proceedings etc. (Reform) (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Justice 1 Committee considers the Criminal Proceedings etc. (Reform) (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1 to 5, sections 7 to 66, section 6, section 67, schedule and sections 68 to 71.
